MAN.TITLE: xfpolys

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : matrices of the same size (p,n) (points of the polygons).

DESCRIPTION.P: xfpolys fills a set of polygons of the same size defined by the two matrices xpols and ypols. The coordinates of each polygon are stored in a column of xpols and ypols.
The pattern for filling polygon number i is given by fill(i):

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: if fill(i)<0, the polygon is filled with pattern id -fill(i).
if fill(i)=0, the polygon is drawn with the current dash style (or current color).
if fill(i)>0, the polygon is filled with pattern id fill(i). Then its contour is drawn with the current dash (or color) and closed if necessary.
